article:
An 'operational context' (OLC) for an operation is the external environment that
influences its operation. For a mobile application, the OLC is defined by the
combined hardware/firmware/software configurarions of several appliances or
devices, as well as the bearer of the mobiles of these units and other work
position environment this person as the key stakeholder makes use of in timely,
spatial and modal coincidence.

This concept differs from the operating context and does not address the
operating system of computers.
